articles.description: As Gareth Southgate becomes Sir Gareth, BBC Sport looks at the short list of managerial greats he joins in receiving the honour.
articles.title: Gareth Southgate knighthood: Former England boss joins list of football greats as he becomes Sir Gareth

articles.description: Follow live text, radio commentary, score updates and match stats from England U21 vs Netherlands U21 in the UEFA U21 Championship.
articles.title: U21 Euros semi-finals LIVE: England vs Netherlands - radio, live text & match stats

articles.description: British number one Emma Raducanu succumbs to defeat by teenager Maya Joint in an edgy second-round match at Eastbourne.
articles.title: Eastbourne: Emma Raducanu loses to Maya Joint in second round, Jodie Burrage beaten by Barbora Krejcikova

articles.description: BBC Sport looks at how Ben Stokes has struck fear into the opposition with his side's ability to seemingly chase any target in English conditions.
articles.title: England vs India: Ben Stokes' side rip up rulebook with supreme run chases

articles.description: Archie Goodburn was 21 when he was told he had brain cancer. A year on, he's still competing and still fighting to help others.
articles.title: Archie Goodburn: The Commonwealth Games swimmer who might not see 40

articles.description: Arsenal are exploring the signing of Brentford midfielder Christian Norgaard amid uncertainty over whether Thomas Partey will sign a new contract.
articles.title: Arsenal eye Brentford's Christian Norgaard amid Thomas Partey uncertainty

articles.description: Former England midfielder Adam Lallana retires from playing at the age of 37.
articles.title: Adam Lallana: Former England and Southampton midfielder retires

articles.description: Wimbledon will be without line judges for the first time next week - will 'sport's best dressed officials' be missed?
articles.title: Wimbledon 2025: No line judges this year, but will they be missed?

articles.description: Centre Hunter Paisami and hooker Matt Faessler are released by Australia and can play for Queensland against the British and Irish Lions.
articles.title: British and Irish Lions: Paisami and Faessler released to Reds

articles.description: Nottingham Forest netball coach Chelsea Pitman recalls her tough fertility journey and says pregnancy and motherhood should not be taboo in sport.
articles.title: Nottingham Forest: Chelsea Pitman on miscarriage and pregnancy
